sentences.entry: SELECT id, username, password, last_login, attempt, status, email FROM user
SELECT id, username, password, last_login, attempt, status, email FROM user WHERE id = %s
INSERT user (username, password, last_login, attempt, status, email) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
UPDATE user SET username = %s, password = %s, last_login = %s, attempt = %s, status = %s, email = %s WHERE id = %s
